2020-08-01.name: Ani ni Tsukeru Kusuri wa Nai! 4
2020-08-01.desc:
* Based on a Chinese web comic by Yu Lei.

Shi Miao has a violent streak which she likes to take out on her idiot older brother, Shi Fen. The school comedy about sibling love, romance, and food continues!

Source: Tokyo Otaku Mode

Note: It was distributed via the Internet in China starting from August 2020. In Japan the broadcast on Tokyo MX started in October 2020.
